news.news_3_subtitle: Improve your bots in Artificial Inteligence and leave them ready to manage situations that would normally require human input.
news.news_4_subtitle: Interact with your clients or users in Agents with greater control with all your chats in one place.

On your next invoice only the amount for the active contacts used so far will appear. To proceed with the removal type {sentence}.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.info_price: Our base price is R$ 1,200.00 (with up to 1,000 active contacts). After that, the exceeding number of active contacts will be multiplied by your individual cost.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Your questions were not addressed in the questions below? Please contact our support via phone number {phone} or the site atendimento.weni.ai

will_the_price_change.title: Will there be any changes to the plan I hired? Will the values ​​remain the same?
will_the_price_change.answer:
Do not worry! You continue to have all rights previously agreed, as well as payment for active contacts.
All changes to our product have been built to deliver the best possible experience for your organization and your audience, at no additional cost to you.

did_push_and_bothub_change_name.title: Have Push and BotHub systems changed their names?
did_push_and_bothub_change_name.answer:
Yeah! Now, we offer a unified platform that offers even more autonomy, security, and connectivity. At Weni Platform, all systems are connected in a single interface, with the same login and control panel.

Thus, Push, BotHub and Rocket.chat become modules called Flows, Artificial Intelligence, and Agents respectively.

how_can_i_access_the_new_push_and_bothub.title: How do I access the new Push and BotHub?
how_can_i_access_the_new_push_and_bothub.answer:
Weni Platform is accessed through weni.ai. And that is where the Flows and Artificial Intelligence modules are located.
You can also access it directly from the platform URL dash.weni.ai.

will_my_chatbot_be_impacted_by_this_chan.title: Will my chatbot be impacted by this change?
will_my_chatbot_be_impacted_by_this_chan.answer:
No way! You will continue to design and customize your chatbots as before. Everything you have built, as well as the features you already know, will be kept.

There will be no need for large learning curves. The combination of systems on a single platform will allow you to enjoy the full power of Weni technologies in an even simpler way and with less possibility of bugs.

will_any_functionality_change.title: Will any functionality change?
will_any_functionality_change.answer:
Just the way we structure “Organizations (Orgs)”.

When accessing the platform, you will notice that your flows and artificial intelligence are within an organization (Org). What was org on Push, became Project. So your Org can have several projects with their respective bits of intelligence.

what_will_i_find_about_new_benefits.title: What will I find of new benefits on the Weni Platform?
what_will_i_find_about_new_benefits.answer:
• Notifications about the system status: if we are experiencing any instability in the modules, see Home> System Status;
  • Search field: do a quick search for flows and bits of intelligence in one place;
  • Easy language change: in the main menu, change the platform language easily;
  • Update notices: stay on top of new features and news from Weni at Home> Latest Updates.

is_it_possible_i_lose_any_data_from_my_c.title: Is it possible to lose some data from my chatbot?
is_it_possible_i_lose_any_data_from_my_c.answer: No data will be lost. The migration has been carried out gradually and with all the necessary care needed so that nothing is lost on the way.

will_my_integrations_be_affected.title: Will my API integrations be affected?
will_my_integrations_be_affected.answer: The integrations you have chosen are maintained and we are working hard to make them more efficient and easier to do.

do_my_permissions_remain_the_same.title: Do my permissions remain the same?
do_my_permissions_remain_the_same.answer:
We now have only three permission levels:
  • The Contributor: creates and edits flows and intelligence. You do not have access to sensitive data;
  • The Viewer: is only allowed to see the projects;
  • The Administrator: has access to everything on the platform. This includes, for example, payment and member management data.
It is worth mentioning that these permissions are assigned to an Organization and are used for all its projects, in addition to all modules.

how_and_who_do_i_ask_for_help.title: If I have a problem with the platform or have any questions, how and to whom do I request help?
how_and_who_do_i_ask_for_help.answer: Just contact our Support Team at {phone} or send a message to atendimento.weni.ai.
